hampHill.name: Hampton Hills
hampHill.tweet: Update: 5/28/2022 - Trails are OPEN, surface is drying up, still some slick areas. Enjoy, ride safe!

eastRim.name: East Rim
eastRim.tweet: CVNP EAST RiM is OPEN Sunday 5/29 Signs will be flipped later today.

royalView.name: Royalview
royalView.tweet: Royalview trails remain Closed (Sunday). Too many soft sections.

westCreek.name: West Creek
westCreek.tweet: West Creek remains CLOSED today, Sunday May 29. It needs more drying time.

OECR.name: Ohio & Erie Canal Reservation
OECR.tweet: Ohio & Erie Canal flow trails are closed today due to rain 5/16

vulturesKnob.name: Vultures Knob
vulturesKnob.tweet: 5/28 Trail Status: OPEN - but use caution ⚠️ We have a tree down for sure after Suspension Bridge. Hopefully nothing too muddy. Use your best judgement. https://t.co/zZ1s9RycBE
